summary: Completed comprehensive testing of textbook store app. Backend APIs working well (96.2% success rate) with 8 sample textbooks seeded. Frontend loads correctly with Spanish text, theme/language toggles functional. Main issues: admin authentication flow and user registration form validation.

minor_bugs.issue: Expects query parameters instead of JSON body
minor_bugs.impact: Admin setup API call format mismatch

ui_bugs.issue: Confirm password field validation not properly handled

integration_issues.issue: Success toast shows but redirect to admin dashboard fails

passed_tests: Landing page loads with Spanish text by default
Language toggle switches between Spanish and Chinese
Theme toggle switches between light and dark mode
Catalog page shows 8 sample textbooks with filters working
Backend APIs (25/26 tests passed - 96.2% success rate)
Sample data seeding (8 textbooks + admin user)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix admin authentication flow - login succeeds but redirect to admin dashboard fails due to 401 error on /api/auth/me. Also fix user registration form to properly handle confirm password field validation.
